addr: The Human Rights Action Centre. 17-25 New Inn Yard. London EC2A 3EA GB
title: Researchers in Fundraising Conference and Awards 2015
desc: We are  The number of delegates the RiF Conference attracts grows year-on-year. In 2014 the conference was attended by over 200 individuals from over 100 different organisations. Limited space is available at some workshop sessions, so register now to secure your space. RIF is offering 80 reduced-rate Early Bird Tickets on a strictly first-come first-served basis. The ticket price includes entry to the Conference and Awards, plus lunch, refreshments and a drinks reception. The following ticket prices are for individuals working in the charity and not-for-profit sector. If you represent a company please contact interim RiF Treasurer Alison Clarke@breastcancercare.org.uk? to purchase a ticket. To keep administration costs to a minimum, RiF requests that attendees pay by card. The payment card does not need to be registered to the individual attending the conference; organisational purchasing and procurement cards are also accepted.  Early Bird:? IoF Individual Member: ?60 [Limit to 20 in total] Early Bird: Non-IoF Member: ?75 [Limit to 60 in total] IoF Individual Member Standard Ticket: ?80 Non-IoF Member Standard Ticket: ?100
